website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, creamy cleanser for those with clogged and oily pores.
pros: Contains Amazonian white clay that naturally detoxifies skin, removing dirt and bacteria
cons: Some users with particularly sensitive skin found it to be a tad too harsh

customer_reviews.title: I have very clear skin and never have any problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very clear skin and never have any problem with it. After I started using this I got small bumps all over my face. Also made my skin very dry. Never going to buy this ever again. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Khadge

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! You'll ruin your face!!!
customer_reviews.text: Crap! Absolute crap! Burnt and blistered my face with this terrible face cleanser! Had to get on antibiotics and prescription face ointment due to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha West

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash for (cystic) acne prone people
customer_reviews.text: I am prone to cystic acne, as well as regular every day acne, and I have huge pores. I’m a 25 years old woman with PCOS (hormone imbalance) that causes all my acne woes. This product is by far the BEST face wash for someone like me. Keeps my face CLEAN AF but doesn’t completely dry it out. (I stick to a daily skin routine with several other products as well.)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Zoha

customer_reviews.title: Sucks the dirt
customer_reviews.text: This stuff it a miracne for my face. I found it at walmart the first time I used it. Told my Mary Kay rep that I like it better than the face wash they carry. She didn't like that too much😂 I bought another on Amazon and it's cheaper than walmart. Keeps my face so clear. I use mine mainly in the shower. It makes my face tingle and feels as though it's sucking the dirt from my pores. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MellyC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chemical exfoliator good enough for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: Having very oily skin, this face wash is my go to for daily use. I use it twice daily whenever I shower, and it helps to keep my breakouts in check. However, do note that because there is salicylic acid (to exfoliate) in the product, if you leave it on for too long you may irritate your skin. Personally, after using this product, I like to follow up with toner and a hyaluronic acid cream, because it is a good way to rehydrate your skin without adding oil and clogging your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lai

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use, but good for occasional issues
customer_reviews.text: It's NOT for everyday use, please be advised! This cleaner says it can be used everyday, but I think it is strictly for occasional use for skin issues that pop up every once in a while. I use it sparingly when I'm having an eruption and it helps me. Even though, I have very sensitive, oily skin. I don't use this as an everyday part of my skincare regimen. I use it maybe once or twice a week or after my period. Hope this helps someone before they buy.
customer_reviews.author: MayLee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any difference
customer_reviews.text: It cleans just as well as any other facewash I guess, but I haven't noticed my face clearing up AT ALL. I'm 11 weeks pregnant and just started to break out like a teenager again. I read the great reviews and thought this product was the answer. NOPE. And I hate that menthol is an ingredient, it makes your face tingle to FEEL like it's getting clean. But that's just the menthol. I really don't think this product is a deep cleanser whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: StarDust

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: A Youtuber I subscribe to recommended this product in her skin care routine. We both have oily/sensitive acne prone skin, so I wanted to try this cleanser out. However, despite being a product for oily skin, it made my face oily soon after use. I also woke up the next day with two big, irritated, and painful bumps on my forehead. I think it’s strange that this cleanser has a strong menthol/peppermint sensation during use, but it doesn’t mention cooling effect anywhere on the bottle. I continued to feel the cooling sensation for several minutes after thoughly washing the product off.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it ok
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this cause I just wanted to wash my face really good before getting these new glasses. I read the bad reviews but I ignored them cause my skin isn’t really high maintenance and it’s not sensitive at all. I put a little bit on cause I was still being cautious cause of the bad reviews and it started burning sooo bad. It felt like my face was melting off and now I have red patches everywhere. Don’t be like me. Dont ignore the reviews. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Janelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I use it daily and I have sensitive oily skin. I put a drop or two on my clarosonic brush depending on if I wore makeup or not and I haven't had any skin problems since using it. Awesome product Its doesn't dry out my skin and it does have a lovely clean scent but its not over powering nor long-lasting on the skin, once your rinsed its gone.
customer_reviews.author: To the point

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but do not use if sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I read so many bad reviews on this, however I have not had any dermatitis reaction to this product. Please test a small part of your face FIRST before putting on your entire face. Some people DO have sensitive skin and this product has caused breakouts and chemical burns for them. I love the texture of this, the smell, and the fact that it keeps my adult acne AWAY even during my menses. I do not leave it on for more than 30 seconds after scrubbing my face. It does have a tingling effect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie B

customer_reviews.title: Caused dryness of skin & blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product daily since May 20th and my skin has gotten worse EXCEPT for the oil issues. I have noticed less oil but more breakouts and they’re disgusting. I usually has tiny clusters of bumps on my forehead and one or two on my chin but since using Biore, I’m getting BLACKHEADS all over my chin and large bumps on my forehead, ear, under my chin/neck, etc. It also dries my skin out a lot and I haven’t seen Biore mention a moisturizer to pair with this product despite a lot of googling. I wish I hadn’t missed my return window by trying to “stick it out”. I’m not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: NSW27

customer_reviews.title: 1 month works but burns. Worried it might not be healthy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a month. Everytime it burned for a few hours for me and turned my face red, however I have seen it clean my pores out and some of the blackheads became easy to remove. For me it worked how it was supposed to but I'm not going to use it any more. I'm more worried it'll cause more harm than good. And my face had never burned like this with any cleanser before.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Please read the reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my cart at the last minute because it had 4.5 stars and was inexpensive. Only after I purchased it I read the reviews. I don't know why I thought I would have better luck than everyone else with this product. This charcoal cleanser damaged my face for a few weeks. It dried it out completely and made my face painful to touch. It's insane how dangerously bad this product is for you. Please don't buy it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lochslocs

customer_reviews.title: Oily Skin People Unite!
customer_reviews.text: There are dozens of us, dozens! If you have oily skin this is perfect! I have been using for a year, very happy that Amazon is selling this product. I use it in the morning and at night. Combined with a regular shower routine this keeps my skin moisturized, but not oily. I feel clean and like my pores are clean. I have black/white heads on my nose and this helps me combat that by removing oils and cleaning pores. If you find yourself looking at your hands after touching your face and notice you have a lot of oils, this can help you!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1317

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a solution!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling with painful acne around my chin for a while now. I used this growing up and haven’t for the past 10 years. I forgot how efficient it was with stopping breakouts fast and healing pimples that I’ve already rose to the surface. Not only does it Give my pores a deep clean but it also helps keep them nice and tight after a wash! 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST. FACEWASH. EVERRRRRR. that’s all... Jk I’m not kidding. I have oily/dry skin, I have super sensitive skin and this is amazing stuff. I use it in the shower and I scrub my face. When I get out I literally can feel such a difference in my face. It’s buttery soft and just feels good! I love it... plus, the smell is amazing! 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lauren Browning

customer_reviews.title: Good face Wash
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the Neutrogena Oil-Free Face Wash cause at the time. when I first started buying face wash it was easiest to get that worked. But this face wash improves on it. It gets rid of everything without being as harsh on skin. Plus it has the menthol like icey feel to make u feel refreshed. The Neutrogena one used to dry out my face sometimes especially during winter. This one has yet to dry out my face.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous US Consumer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product for oily/combination and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of bad reviews about this product but I enjoy it. My skin is soooo oily and somewhat sensitive. It’s at the point were everytime I wear makeup it’s like I’m shiny everywhere. The T -Zone the cheeks, my forehead, it’s just not the look. I can’t even wear just blush without oiling up. This helps a ton. If u leave it on for about 30 seconds you’re skin feels really fresh and follow up a moisturizer after that and ur set. It’s great for just get dirty and oil straight out of your pores after a long school or work day. It’s pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Something's changed recently
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff for years and have loved it. The smell wasn't too strong and it kicked my face into shape and helped even with hormonal breakouts. They've either changed the formula recently or I got a defunct product this time because the smell is absolutely horrible. Either way, it's like washing my face with Lysol and has destroyed my expectations of the brand. I'm tossing out the full bottle and taking my business elsewhere. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This product caused breakouts along my hairline
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work, but I have returned to my old tried-and-true facial cleanser. At first, it feels soothing and cool and it "felt" like it was working. But when I started getting acne cysts all along my hairline (which didn't seem to go away), I began to fear the worst. I'm middle-aged; I shouldn't be getting breakouts like a teenager. When I stopped using it, the acne went away. This product doesn't work; in fact, it made my skin worse.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I've used it before but thought I should switch up my face wash every so often. I tried aveeno cream. That didnt seem to make my face feel clean and seemed to clog my pores more. This makes my face feel and look clean. I have sensitive skin and had no problem.with this. The first wash you can see the difference. It smells good and tingles a bit. Not bad or painful. A bit drying but I just put a little moisturizer after and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was a bit skeptical due to the bad reviews (I thought this would be bootleg), this product is amazing for me! I have super oily, not so sensitive skin. My pores were large on my forehead and nose and I've been using it for about a week or 2 and theres been a significant difference in the size of my pores!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Yess baby! Smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i just received today. An I used it, because ibwas headed out. This stuff smells amazing. An yes it foams. An u only really need one pump. Which will save u money. because u can keep it a lil longer. I gave it a 4. Because after a month. I will do another review an change the star. If it meets my expectations. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and was wary to try this after a friend recommended it, but it is AMAZING! It does have a cooling, tingly feel to it the first times you use it, but after using daily for a few weeks my skin got used to it. I have combination skin and this works awesome. It leaves my face feeling clean and helps my acne-prone skin! It doesn't have a strong smell, but it does leave you feeling a little dry after using (in my opinion, it is the winter and very dry where I live right now). However, I follow up with moisturizer anyways and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Kurowski

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this since I've been seeing charcoal in so many different products and reading about all of it's benefits (is it the new coconut oil??!) but was disappointed in this product. While it does leave my face feeling clean, it hasn't improved my skins clarity or reduced breakouts. It also doesn't fully remove makeup (and I'm talking about minimal make-up here), so you need that extra step of removing make-up first, and I'm not looking to add extra steps to my routine. The pump bottle is nice for in the shower, but now I'm stretching for stars... Won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: So I've waited to do a review on this to see how long it took to make a significant change. Wearing a mask due to covid19, my face broke out REAL bad. I bought this after reading reviews that it made peoples face worse at the beginning and they stopped using it. I know face washes normally do that to me so I stuck with it and I'm so glad I did! My face is clear and it feels so soft!!! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this cleanser is not what I had hoped. It's quite strong and you need to follow the directions perfectly. Otherwise, it will burn your face. Do NOT use if you have sensitive or dry skin. I have combination skin, and this product does not help to balance it out or leave it nice and matte. It leaves my face feeling clean, so I can't complain about that. But I won't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bird

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Dirtless clean face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Uber cool face wash especially in this summer time. It’ll take time to set to your face. But finally it leaves your face fresh for hours , cleans the dirt and oil . Whitens skin. Moistures well . It worked for me . Definitely a perfect replacement for the one who used Garnier charcoal face gel wash . And charcoal as an ingredient is the show of the product. Softens skin. Pleasant smell . Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Kranthi

customer_reviews.title: I have repurchased this soap many times!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite drug store face washes. It leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed, rinses well, and has a pleasant but not overpowering scent. The price is right. A bottle will last you an appropriate amount of time. My husband really likes this as well and he has sensitive skin. I have repurchased many times.
customer_reviews.author: cke

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin feel nice, but leaked in shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product unfortunately was not packed well and leaked in shipping. It came in a clear plastic bag--the bag had the face soap that has leaked all over it and the bottle was sticky. It was messy when unpacking it. That said, I have been using this face soap regularly and it makes my skin feel fresh and clean. It has a smoother glide than other face soaps. The soap itself is black in color, but not thick like a mud-mask - more of a smooth, clear texture. I do feel I am getting a good face wash when using it. Worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Contains Salicylic Acid
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list did not include salicylic acid, but when I received this item, it lists it under ingredients. I am nursing so I cannot use it. Please update the ingredient list to provide the correct information.
customer_reviews.author: Trow10

customer_reviews.title: Not good, forcing more breakouts & oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product prior to my purchase from amazon and I loved it! This has a totally different result than my previous purchase. After using this my skin is more oily and I am breaking out. I don’t know if this is a new/old formula or product, but it’s not good at all!
customer_reviews.author: jlou4444

customer_reviews.title: Over stripping and causses dryness
customer_reviews.text: Has small granules that could cause microtears in skin. Very stripping for my skin. It felt taut and really dry after use which is never a good sign. It smells nice though. I would not recommend for sensitive or dry skin. Plus, charcoal doesn’t really have well researched benefits in terms of skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Not sure of authenticity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this through amazon to save a few dollars compared to buying in store. I have used this product for years now and never had any issues but noticed after using the online order, I had breakouts (which i rarely do). While it smelled and was packaged the same, i have some doubts if this was a legitimate Biore product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash! I have acne prone oily skin and I use this once a day. I find that leaving it on my skin for longer than 30seconds can leave it very red (chemical burn). So I only wash and rinse quickly. Doesn’t bother me. Leaves my skin with a icy, refreshing feeling. It does have a scent but it’s pleasant. Also, one pump is the perfect amount for my face and chest together. Lasts me a while. Highly recommend if you have acne prone skin! Does not exfoliate tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Really refreshing with mint sent. It lather good. You have to lather good otherwise you will feel a little remaining of mint scented cells (like little sandy things) kind of bother your skin like you are using scrub facial wash, not so many but it really bothers me when I feel something in my nice lathers facial wash form.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: My go to face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive typically dry skin and use this every night. I love the clean feeling I get after and it seems to help get rid of the pimples I get here and there. It's one of the few products I feel I'll be using for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Been verified
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product this week and I have to say that I love it because it's great for sensitive skin and for those who have red undertones. It doesn't burn when you put it on it just cleans out your pores and your face feels so much lighter and looks so much better. I saw no downside to this. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kara McKee Hall

customer_reviews.title: not worth risking
customer_reviews.text: since it was cheap wanted to give it a try. but i don't see any difference to my skin after applying this. Some people seem to be having reaction to their skin. i probably was lucky that i didn't have any issue. But I don't see any change either in my skin. Given that there is a good chance that your skin could be adversely impacted and almost no upside, I would not recommend this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: TechKnow

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for three nights in a row. I didn't mind that it made my skin feel cold and tingly after washing my face, but it caused a really bad skin reaction after a couple days. My face got red patches and started burning constantly. I do already have sensitive skin and am prone to reactions, so I recommend that you do not try this product if you have sensitive skin like me. Also, there aren't returns if the item doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, beware of shipping!
customer_reviews.text: It came in the same box as my big box of rice and was dented. It came with no packaging of its own (i.e. boxed or wrapped) Not that it’s worrisome but my bottle could’ve been damaged and this product isn’t cheap. My brother-in-law uses this and let me try some. It leaves your face feeling cool and resfreshed and does wonders for clearing blackheads and reducing oily and combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hoodie

customer_reviews.title: CREAMY TEXTURE WITH THOROUGH CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: EVEN AT MY AGE, I STILL HAVE A SLIGHTLY OILY T-ZONE AND CAN (OCCASSIONALLY) EXPERIENCE A LIGHT ACNE BREAKOUT IN THE DEEP SIZES OF MY NOSE WHERE IT MEETS MY CHEEKS. SOME CHARCOAL CLEANSERS ARE JUST TOO COARSE. THIS ONE IS CREAMY, CLEANS WELL, RINSES NICELY, AND SMELLS AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I’m terrified of this stuff! Why is it still on sale here?? I haven’t even used it on my face for fear of chemical burning or terribly breaking out my face! Just look at these reviews, genuine horror stories! And I can’t return it (unopened) right now. I’m so upset. Just don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well... For some
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this works alright for me. I was able to use it and it clears my skin up fairly well. HOWEVER, my girlfriend used this stuff as well and got a nasty reaction that others are posting on here. Full of little bumps and what not. You NEED a moisturizer after using as well. It dries your face up. It does get down and cleans... But at a cost for some
customer_reviews.author: Lee Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who LOVES it. She is big into the activated charcoal products and for her face this has been her absolute favorite. I had to try it out for myself and I think it is towards the too of my favorite face wash as well. We both got the tingly clean feeling. Definitely going to be keeping this in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Third order of this stuff. This product is pretty good for my skin. I use it in the shower every morning and it seems to work well for me. Some days i do skip it as i forget. After doing this i do recommend a moisturizer if your skin feels a bit dry.
customer_reviews.author: Supergod7

customer_reviews.title: The 1 Star Review are Right
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you burning sensation which I kind of liked, but after 2 weeks of use I am starting to get zits like all the other reviews say. I rarely got zits before. It is definitely related to this cleanser. I also use moisturizing cream after rinsing so it isn't just dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Murray West

customer_reviews.title: Must have for facial care.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this definitely helps. I've used this for a few years now and I love It! It deep cleans and leaves my face soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Best I’ve found yet!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have oily skin and bigger pores. It shrinks my pores and my face doesn’t get near as oily as it did. I will definitely continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerpants

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave it on too long.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my face, and was about to jump in the shower, but then got a phone call. After a few minutes I washed it off and then my face was red for a few hours afterward. My fault for leaving on too long, I think it was the menthol that kind of gave me a little sunburn. It did go away, and it does clean my face
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and feel of this product! I have very oily skin and this helps. I recommend using a little sponge or scrub when working it into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The Only Face-Wash I Will Use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It doesn't overly dry your skin but won't leave it oily either. I won't use anything else. I even tried another kind that was this same brand, and it completely dried out my skin. So while I can't be a witness for Biore as an overall brand, I can say for sure that this product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser for oil skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly impressed with Biore’ Deep Pore Charcoal Cleanser. This is my 1st purchase of a Charcoal product & I was not disappointed. The moisturizing feel is great. I feel my skin is rejuvenated upon wiping dry. I have already seen an impact on my pores. I highly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Initially the reviews on here scared me and I was worried to try it. My sister was raving about it though so I gave it a shot. I am SO GLAD I did! It has cleared up my skin in a matter of days. I’m on day 3 and my skin is looking great and I had zero of the reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Lemeow

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few face washes that don’t break me out! However, I wouldn’t recommend leaving it on your skin any longer than you have to since the cooling sensation can be potentially irritating. This face wash always clears my face up if I’m experiencing a breakout. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: McK

customer_reviews.title: Still have blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Even though I still see black heads on my nose area, it’s a decent facial wash. It feels nice on my face like a refresher type of feeling when you rinse off after each use. Though I see some blackheads, I don’t hate this product. It’s good for the price and had no bad reaction from this.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: I don't generally have a lot of acne problems, ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally have a lot of acne problems, and honestly wash my face as a preventative measure. However I broke out instantly from using this soap. I gave it to a friend to use and she broke out instantly too. I'm not sure if it's just a sensitivity problem or a formula problem but I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: ReeceDarlene

customer_reviews.title: great skincare product
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff. honestly, i work at a movie theater so i wear makeup to clog my pores, but then there are some days when i'm lazy and after work my skin feels so greasy, this feels so good on my skin and i haven't really broken out in a long time. also my blackheads have gone down so i don't have to use a mask for them once a week anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Felt it working during first wash!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of minty anything but the mint like scent and tingly sensation were very refreshing. I have super oily skin that nothing but alcohol itself helps but ONE use and I could see and feel the difference. Sadly it was short lived and my face became oily again only hours later but I washed it again the next morning and I was fine for a few more hours.
customer_reviews.author: Smally

customer_reviews.title: A cooling after feel
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day. Makes my skin feel so clean and invigorated. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Clean face. Weird smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It leaves my face feeling very clean with a slight tingling sensation. It doesn’t smell good though. Honestly it smells kind of like that white glue that came in those massive jugs you used in art class back in middle school.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Clean, refreshed appearance!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only face wash that give me a sense of cleanliness. With other face washes I've noticed an oily presence on my face when I got up. With this face wash I don't experience that. I tried the 1 oz product at Walmart first before buying the bigger sizes. I saw that some people experience teactions but i havent.
customer_reviews.author: BellMa

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY & DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: So I made the mistake in buying this product without even reading the reviews first. I just finished using it and I was about to go to bed but then I see a rash appearing on my cheeks. This product broke me out immediately after using it. I’m so pissed because my skin was so smooth and clean before I used this. And now I have this red bumpy rash on my face. I don’t even have sensitive skin and I’m not really allergic to much. Nothing ever broke me out this before. This is a terrible face wash. SAVE YOUR MONEY & PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER in love with this cleanser. It smells really fresh and wakes me up in the morning! It leaves my skin radiant and smooth. I’ve always struggled with blackheads but after using it only two days in a row my face (especially my T-zone) is blackhead free! It’s an amazing product and a generous size for the price point. I will definitely be ordering it again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Em Bres

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Every other product that I've tried to use daily has dried my skin out to the point I felt I was always putting on moisturizer. This does not make me feel that way. After washing my face with this, my face feels refreshed and smooth...like you want your face to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Manz

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash ive ever used. I love the tingle feeling after I wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Deep Cleans!
customer_reviews.text: It burns if you leave it on for more than a second. I didn't mind it though; I knew it was really deep cleaning my pores. When I was done washing my face, it was red and a little splotchy. Again, I was actually excited about this, knowing that meant it was doing its job.I'm excited to keep using this! (I have a slightly oily skin type)
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love how it makes my face feels! It’s like minty and refreshing
customer_reviews.author: B.Mone

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I really love this facial cleanser, it cleans extremely well and leaves my face feeling refreshed and clean with the tightness. It does leave me a little dry feeling though so I make sure to moisturize well after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Fam Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Love this face wash!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It seems to be great at cleaning my oily skin effectively. It moisturizes it effectively as well and I like its smell. Again it is great especially if you have oilier skin
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bloomberg

customer_reviews.title: Don't Think Product Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product in CVS and loved it. However I do not think the ones I bought are authentic Biore products. The color is lighter and feel on my skin is different. Won't be restocking from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product because I was intrigued that it was a charcoal daily face wash. It has worked very well and does the job. Always great to be able to shop for essentials directly from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Delahla Desjarlais

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes Pores
customer_reviews.text: This product really does minimize pores. I have sensitive skin and it turns my face a bit red though but it goes away with cold water. It doesn't really have that strong of a smell either which is nice. I recommend putting cold water on your face before you put moisturizer on though because it will clog your pores if you dont.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS ARE ACCURATE.
customer_reviews.text: Believe the horrible reviews, not the positive ones. I do not have sensitive skin and after three washes broke out all over on my forehead, just as seen in these pictures. I’m livid. I don’t ever have acne issues and this literally caused it. Throwing away. Never buying again.
customer_reviews.author: robert whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Good deep cleaning to your skin
customer_reviews.text: After using this cleanser for a few months i can say that it does give you a good deep cleaning and I am happy with it as far as it's function. The reason for a star short of 5 stars is the unknown reason why the bottle dispensing snout tends to have a brown growth around after using it for a few week. So either use all of the cleanser within 1 to 2 weeks, or have to do really good clean of dispensing snout and keep in dry place after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: This product is greasy
customer_reviews.text: I don't get this product at all. It claimed to be for oily skin yet I feel like I'm putting straight grease on my face. There is no scrubbing "sand" at all. And I've been getting acne again since starting this. NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Deep Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I really feel the deep cleaning with this product, my face was stressed and my pores were so large it helped take out the dirt from under my skin and cools my skin and minimized me pores. Sure will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Milie

customer_reviews.title: Super refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it for a full month yet but my skin has been breaking out less and less with this product. But don’t think this product will cure acne! It helps me with 99% removal or dirt and foundation on my face. I know this because after I use a toner, there isn’t any discoloration on the cotton ball;indicating no dirt in my pores. I also love how refreshing this feels on my face. It’s like I slapped mint on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Bad ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I’ve had good luck with charcoal bars and I needed something a little better to travel with. After using a couple times I was reading up on skincare tips and the number 3 ingredient is sodium lauryl sulfate which is horrible for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: perfumey smell, it didn't agree with my skin which is not sensitive AT ALL, did not help my acne, left my with a headache from the smell, and made my skin irritated and red for a while after
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jones

customer_reviews.title: My new go to!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve sworn by charcoal face wash for years now but I’ve never been brand specific... until now. This face wash leaves my skin feeling soft and not dry at all. It’s definitely the best I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t really have any problem with the product. 3 things to note though is that it is drying, the cooling effect is very surprising when you put it on, and it really didn’t do anything. I felt after using this awhile I didn’t notice any changes in my face
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses and hate it when my skin gets oily. Oily skin makes wearing glasses uncomfortable. So I just use a drop of this on my face and now wearing glasses is less annoying. I think this is a great product and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff H.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cleanser every day as part of my skin care routine. I love it! Its tingling feeling leaves my skin feeling so clean. I do recommend using a light moisturizer after use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopfanatic

customer_reviews.title: My go-to face wash
customer_reviews.text: I’m a man who’s been using this product for over 3-4 years. I Use this product once when I wake up and once after showering and I always enjoy the fresh feeling you get after treating your face. I feel like if I don’t use this, my face will start to immediately break out.
customer_reviews.author: Martian

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I haven’t had a reaction to this product and it does smell good. It lathered up pretty good and my face felt really clean. I probably will order this item again
customer_reviews.author: KeithaNichole

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Im going to be completely honest. I have sensitive and oily ish sometimes dry skin and big pores. i’ve tried EVERY product to help with acne. You name it, i’ve tried it all! I’ve only used this for about 4-5 days and my skin hasn’t looked this good in like.. ever. I’ve had bad acne since I was in the 5th grade surprisingly and I am a senior in high school now. THIS PRODUCT HAS CHANGED MY LIFE! this along with my curology medicine they prescribe me, has changed my life for ever. 100% recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Schaapy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Every time I use it my face feels so fresh! I still have blackheads on my nose so it doesn’t clean super deep, but I still love the way it cleans my face without drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyW

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne!
customer_reviews.text: Now it hasn’t wiped my face clean but it has been helping with my acne and that is huge since NOTHING works! I feel like if I’m more consistent it will definitely clear everything or almost everything! Very cooling effect! (I have combo to oily skin so idk if it works with dry skin).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that charcoal was really good for basically everything... (including the skin). So, bought this bottle and for the past week, I have never had more clear and smooth- clean skin. It instantly makes gross "blimps" (pimples) appear so you can get rid of them FAST. Never been more happy with a cleanser! Although, I gave it a 4 out of 5 because of the bottle- it seems like a huge amount but the pump distributes too much of it out at one time. Just fix that and we are golden!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Feels very, very clean without over drying my skin, will purchase again. There is a tingle when using this product though, so be careful around your eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love charcole and hence liked it . If you are looking for great fragrance then I suggest to avoid but it’s great product for traditional cleanliness
customer_reviews.author: Chads

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only face product I’ve used continuously for three years. I almost never break out because of it. It leaves the skin feeling smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fritzshall

customer_reviews.title: I like charcoal products
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve used this product I like charcoal products so it is likely I will try it again so far I’m enjoying it I like the pump bottle top.
customer_reviews.author: CAA

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: It smells good, and it feels good. It has these little bits of charcoal in it that feel great when scrubbing you're face. And the face wash bottle is lasting me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised to see so many negative reviews..personally I love this product. My blackheads are almost all gone after 1 week. Granted they were tiny blackheads but I had them above my eyebrows,on the cheeks,and nose. I have sensitive skin but this bore charcoal cleanser doesn't effect my skin in any negative way
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Perez

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this face wash but it made me break out so bad. I've struggled with hormonal acne and this made it much worse. I usally have clear skin and once I started using this I broke out very bad. Onve I stopped using it my skin wemt back to normal. I do like the tingling clean feeling you get after using it but overall not what I expected from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for us. I gave it to my son and it made his skin much worse than it was before. He had minor breakouts, after the breaks out increased a lot. Stopped using it, his face was fine. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: uthollie

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the color scare you.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of weeks and really like the way my face feels. I rub some on my face and then use a silicon sponge to work it in. Rinses easily and leaves your face feeling really fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Bioré 19430 Deep Pore Charcoal Daily Face Wash, 6.77 Ounce, with Deep Pore Cleansing for Dirt and Makeup Removal From Oily Skin, Bioré Charcoal
product_meta.description: Size:1.69 Ounce| Style Name:BRIGHTENING CLAY MASKIntroduce them to Biore Deep Pore Charcoal Cleanser for Oily Skin. It purifies pores and deeply cleanses skin. With natural charcoal, known for its ability to draw out and trap impurities and skin purifying technology, this cleanser deep cleans 2 times better than with a basic cleanser. The innovative black cleanser foams white and rinses clean, leaving skin refreshed and tingly smooth. Biore Skincare targets the root of all skin problems—the evil clogged pore. So when it comes to dirt and oil we take a no nonsense approach to fight smarter, not harder. Our scrub, liquid, powder, strip, mask and bar cleansing products go straight to the source of those pesky pores for deeply clean, beautiful skin.
feature_bullets: Purify your pores naturally - This cleanser contains natural charcoal & deep cleans your pores with its oil-trapping power for balanced purification.
Cleaner feeling skin - Our innovative daily cleanser foams white as it purifies pores, then rinses clean to leave skin clean and tingly smooth.
Draw out impurities - Infused with natural charcoal, our skin purifying cleanser deep cleans 2x better than a basic cleanser.
Deep cleansing and oil removal - The properties of Bioré charcoal cleansers, scrubs, and pore strips are ideal for built-up dirt on oily skin.
Designed for daily use - Our facial cleanser is dermatologist tested & provides optimal results when used daily.
